alert.note: Alert for Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:05PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Wood County through 245 PM CDT... At 204 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Rome, or 8 miles south of Wisconsin Rapids, moving northwest at 10 mph. Pea size has been reported with this storm. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Wazeecha and Wisconsin Rapids. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
